name: typescript-strictly-typed
description: Enable configurations for strictly typed TypeScript, ESLint or TSLint, and optionally Angular.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && copyfiles package.json LICENSE README.md bin/cli dist
scripts.release:major: VERSION=major npm run release && npm run githubrelease
scripts.release:minor: VERSION=minor npm run release && npm run githubrelease
scripts.release:patch: VERSION=patch npm run release && npm run githubrelease
scripts.release: if test $VERSION; then npm run build && npm version $VERSION && npm run build && npm publish ./dist && git push && git push --tags; fi
scripts.githubrelease: CHANGELOG=$(sed -n "/^## $npm_package_version/,/^## /p" CHANGELOG.md | sed '1d;$d') && gh release create v$npm_package_version --title v$npm_package_version --notes "$CHANGELOG"

author: Cyrille Tuzi
